headline: Cocoa Prices Settle Sharply Higher as Demand Fears Ease

headline: Good Sign For Valentine's Day? Hershey Jumps Past Buy Point On Earnings, Outlook
summary: Hershey shares took off on a sugar high Thursday after the candy maker beat Wall Street expectations and gave an outlook above analysts' estimates.  The nation's largest confectioner reported a 7% increase in fourth-quarter sales, to $3.091 billion, which included a lift from acquisitions.

headline: Hershey Says It Is Coping With Food Stamp Clampdown
summary: Chocolate maker Hershey said it is working with retailers to blunt the impact of new rules that ban shoppers from purchasing candy with food stamps.  Hershey executives said Thursday that they are closely tracking new state-level restrictions to the program, known as the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program.  Executives said limits on candy so far are in place in only two out of the 12 states that have adopted such restrictions, but the company has been spending time with supermarkets and has a team running scenarios to determine the restrictions’ impact and how to respond.

headline: Hershey (NYSE:HSY) Reports Bullish Q4 CY2025
summary: Chocolate company Hershey (NYSE:HSY) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7% year on year to $3.09 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.71 per share was 21.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Hershey: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.41 per share. The chocolate bar and candy maker posted revenue of $3.09 billion in the period, also surpassing Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $3 billion.

headline: Hershey Expands Easter Candy Line To Support Seasonal Growth Story
summary: Hershey (NYSE:HSY) is rolling out an expanded Easter candy line, featuring new and seasonal products across multiple brands. The line-up includes Jolly Rancher Gummies Fruity Mix, Hershey's Kisses Harry Potter Butterbeer Flavor, Cadbury Mini Eggs in stand-up pouches, and Reese's Mini Eggs in new formats.
